title: Medicine Hut
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Raw, Take-out, European
description: A 100% vegan/vegetarian raw cafe and tea room makes all food fresh daily; 100% of the products are fair trade and 90% are organic. Provides also gluten free, sugar free and reduced sugar, sweet and savory cakes; 50% of cakes are raw vegan. Made-in-house chocolate is available. Serves a selection of cold and hot drinks, including dragon blood with almond milk, stevia, spirulina and chlorella; chai vegan latte with cinnamon; hot ginger beer with spices and others. A selection of loose herbal teas and coffees, as well as fine ceramic, glass and bone china tea accessories and tin tea-jars to purchase in the emporium. Garden seating. Friendly staff and relaxing atmosphere. Child friendly.
